title: Cafe Landwer - Sarona
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe located in a historic 150-year-old building from the Templar period. Has a separate vegan menu section offering around 10 items, including breakfast, salads, mains, and dessert. Soy milk option for coffee.
